articles.title: Mom arrested after leaving kids at home alone to go on trip to Germany
articles.description: Two of the kids are 12. The others are 6 and 7.

articles.title: Lottery scam mastermind rigged more drawings than first thought, records show
articles.description: A secret code active for almost a decade allowed Eddie Tipton to rig “random” lottery drawing dates.

articles.author: Rekha Basu
articles.title: Sent back to Mexico's violence, Des Moines student dies within weeks
articles.description: CLOSE Editor's note: This column has been updated from the original online version with a statement from ICE. Manuel Antonio Cano Pacheco should have graduated high school in Des Moines last month. The oldest of four siblings should have walked across a stage…

articles.author: jclayworth@dmreg.com, Jason Clayworth, jclayworth@dmreg.com
articles.title: The untold story of how a gaming geek with a checkered past pulled off the biggest lottery scam in U.S. history
articles.description: An overlooked software code at the Multi-State Lottery Association allowed a scammer to hijack $24 million in prizes.

articles.author: Des Moines Register
articles.title: Dee Zee Manufacturing invests $60,000 in Des Moines city DART bus line
articles.description: In addition to helping employees arrive at work on time, unlimited bus passes will allow them to take buses across the metro area — ​​​​​​​for free.

articles.author: The Des Moines Register, Rekha Basu, The Des Moines Register
articles.title: DREAMer was killed weeks after being 'escorted' back to Mexico by ICE
articles.description: Manuel Cano Pacheco was brought to America at 3, sent back to Mexico at 19 and within a month, was slain in a country riddled with gang violence.
